item.title: How to Do Tracing in Go Microservice?
item.description: In Microservice architecture, the calling chain is long and complex, to understand each component and the performance of it, you need something called distributed tracing. The idea is simple, you generate a unique ID at the beginning of each request, and carry it along the whole calling chain. The ID is called Correlation IDÂ¹ and you can use it to trace the performance of the entire request. There are two problems need to be solved.
